description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr817 [Fujishima Kousuke] long-running manga of the same name, serialised in the http://anidb.net/cr31447 [Afternoon] magazine. Set one year after http://anidb.net/a2533 [Aa! Megami-sama!].
The song may say thank heaven for little girls, but whom is college student http://anidb.net/ch2215 [Morisato Keiichi] supposed to thank when three honest to goodness Goddesses move in and take over his life? And should he really be all that grateful?
After all, according to most mythologies, relationships between mortals and immortals usually leads to mortifying complications, so we`re already talking about an extremely mixed blessing! And when a fourth Goddess suddenly appears, that blessing quickly becomes a curse. Keiichi`s new friends may be trying to help, but sometimes http://anidb.net/ch2234 [Belldandy], http://anidb.net/ch2240 [Skuld], http://anidb.net/ch2237 [Urd], and http://anidb.net/ch6955 [Peorth] seem less concerned with Keiichi`s safety than they are with establishing a pecking order and ownership rights!
The delicate celestial balance that exists between human and goddess is thrown into complete and utter chaos.

REGULAR.description: Thanks to the Lord of Terror events, the contract between Belldandy and Keiichi has been conveniently lost, and Kami-sama will recall Belldandy soon. Lind is tasked with attempting to recover the audio file if possible. Upon doing this, the phrase he used to make his wish has to be spoken by Keiichi but he doesn`t remember the exact wording.

titles.title: Aa! Negai yo, Mou Ichido!
Aa! Toive, vielä kerran!
Ah! I Wish...Once More!
Ah, faîtes que mon voeu se réalise une seconde fois
ああっ願いよ もう一度っ

REGULAR.description:
The Christmas season is just getting started, and Sayoko is anything but merry. She`s complaining of an "empty" feeling that consumes her. Unable to think of any other reason for her feeling, she blames Keiichi for it since he is the only man at the university who does not vie for her attention. She concludes that in order to fill the void in her heart, she must win Keiichi`s affection. Meanwhile, Urd hints to Belldandy that humans are easily affected by the cold weather and that Keiichi runs the risk of becoming ill. Belldandy knits all of her emotions and memories into a very special sweater for Keiichi. After Keiichi finds Sayoko drunk on the side of the road, Belldandy is accidentally sent on a search to find Keiichi`s sweater, Keiichi on a date with Sayoko, and Sayoko is forced to learn a lesson about feelings.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Nayameru Fukushuu no Joou-sama!
Aa! Vaivautunut koston kuningatar!
Ah! The Beleaguered Queen of Vengeance!
Ah, la reine de la vengeance a des soucis
ああっ悩める復讐の女王さまっ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi looks for a gift in response to Belldandy`s in the previous episode, and Urd convinces him into getting a ring, but that ring he`s interested in is out of his price range, which means having to work extra hard and doing extra jobs to save up for it. With only a few days left until Christmas, will Keiichi be able to save up enough and yet keep his moonlighting a secret from Belldandy?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Annan sinulle tämän tunteen jouluaattona!
Aa! Seiya ni Sasageru Kono Omoi!
Ah! I Offer These Feelings on Christmas Eve!
Ah, Noël, la fête des amoureux !
ああっ聖夜に捧げるこの想いっ!

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi and the gang are invited to Sayoko`s big Christmas gala. Sayoko hopes to embarrass Belldandy with a bunch of sideshows and a drinking contest but Belldandy is unaffected by it. But when she tries a can of Coke for the first time, Belldandy`s demeanor changes, and wherever she spreads happiness, a different sideshow happens on Keiichi!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Haluan täyttää maailman onnella!
Aa! Sekai o Kou de Mitashitai!
Ah! I Want to Fill the World with Happiness!
Ah, tout le monde devrait être heureux !
ああっ世界を幸で満たしたいっ

REGULAR.description:
During a fundraising campaign for the motor club where they attempt to fix vehicles, Keiichi`s Senpai, Ohtaki, helps out a young woman, Satoko, with her motor scooter, and ends up being attracted to her. Keiichi and Belldandy help Ohtaki ask Satoko out on a date. Toshiyuki Aoshima is not pleased about the date, after all Satoko is the University Director`s daughter. He attempts to foil the date and a meeting with Satoko`s father, but Ohtaki may have a bit of luck on his side thanks to Belldandy.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Aallonpituus joka nappaa rakkauden!
Aa! Hikareau Koi no Hachou!
Ah! Well-Matched Vibes of Love!
Ah, les délices de l`amour !
ああっ惹かれあう恋の波長っ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi receives his first love letter from a cute second-year student named Shiho. The girl is more than happy to see him; in fact, she senses evil spirits around Keiichi, and attempts to exorcise them! Shiho even visits their home to perform a large-scale cleansing. Belldandy remains strangely silent as she attempts to deal with her feelings of a different girl giving Keiichi some attention.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Onko tuo mustasukkaisuutta!?
Aa! Sorette Jealousy!?
Ah! Is That Jealousy?!
Ah, c`est ça, la jalousie ?
ああっそれって嫉妬[ジェラシー]っ!?

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi accidentally makes another call to the Goddess help line, and summons the goddess Peorth, who makes her debut in this episode. But since Keiichi already got what he wished for with Belldandy, he doesn`t ask for anything else, but Peorth is intent on having Keiichi wish for something significant, and will stay there until he does.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Anata no Nozomi Kanaemasu wa!
Aa! Toteutan toiveesi!
Ah! I Shall Grant Your Wish!
Ah, tes désirs sont des ordres !
ああっ貴方の望み叶えますわっ

REGULAR.description:
Peorth continues to hang out at the temple, meddling more and more in Keiichi`s life. She belittles Belldandy`s ability to fulfill Keiichi`s wish, and angers the other goddesses to the point where they issue a contest to fulfill Keiichi`s wishes, however simple or unintentionally perverted they might be. Then Peorth attempts to make her own version of the Love Potion by using one of Urd`s ingredients, but that could result in some big time trouble for Keiichi.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Anata no Yaku ni Tachitakute!
Aa! Haluan olla sinulle avuksi!
Ah! I Want to Be of Use to You!
Ah, laisse-moi te rendre service !
ああっあなたの役に立ちたくてっ

REGULAR.description:
Keiichi accepts Peorth`s invitation for a date. As always, the fourth goddess has some extra things planned. However things will not go exactly as Peorth wants, as the other three goddesses come along for the ride on the group date. After several dating situations have not gone the way she planned, Peorth has had enough and challenges Belldandy to a Goddess` Three Game Match where her own presence on Earth will be on the line.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalattaret päättävät voiton treffeillä!
Aa! Megami wa Date de Shoubu!
Ah! The Goddesses Go Head to Head on a Date!
Ah, quand deux déesses s`affrontent !
ああっ女神はデートで勝負っ

REGULAR.description:
Realizing that he can`t be stringing around Peorth and suspecting that Belldandy could be growing jealous again, Keiichi decides to tell Peorth his wish, but it turns out to be a fairly strong one: I want you to fulfill my desire. How will Keiichi be able to see that through and still be faithful to Belldandy?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Se yksi sana jota en saa sanotuksi!
Aa! Sono Hitokoto ga Ienakute!
Ah! I Just Can`t Say It!
Ah, ces mots qu`on arrive pas à dire !
ああっそのひとことが言えなくてっ

REGULAR.description:
This episode introduces Chihiro Fujimi, the senpai of Ohtaki and Tamiya, and the founder of their Motor Club. Chihiro is inspired when she sees Keiichi`s mini-bike, and suggests they have a race together. With the preparation and the actual race, Belldandy and Keiichi get a good glimpse of Chihiro`s character and motives.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Nappaa unelmasi kädelläsi!
Aa! Sono Te de Yume o Tsukamaete!
Ah! Grasp Your Dream with Your Own Hands!
Ah, réalisons nos rêves !
ああっその手で夢をつかまえてっ

REGULAR.description:
Urd receives a visit from a guy from her past. Could it be a former boyfriend?
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalattaren kyyneleet ja Keiichin unelma!
Aa! Megami no Namida to Kare no Yume!
Ah! A Goddess`s Tears and His Dream!
Ah, les larmes de la déesse et le rêve de son ex
ああっ女神の涙と彼の夢っ

REGULAR.description:
Belldandy rides a bicycle around and inspires Skuld to try to learn for the first time. But it proves to be difficult for the expert mechanic. Skuld is about to give up, when she meets a boy around her age, who offers to help her ride.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Herää! Tuo tunne!
Aa! Mezamete! Sono Kimochi!
Ah! Let Those Feelings Awaken!
Ah, ce trouble qui s`éveille en moi !
ああっ目覚めてっ! その気持ちっ

REGULAR.description:
Skuld develops her goddess magic skills, and gets inspired to summon her angel, but accidentally allows the egg that holds her. The goddesses manage to extract the angel from Skuld`s body and Noble Scarlet is born! The new little angel wants to help Skuld in any way she can, including setting her up with Sentaro.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Itoshiki Watashi no Cupid!
Aa! Rakas cupidoni!
Ah ! Mon cupidon adoré !
Ah! My Darling Cupid!
ああっ愛しき私のキューピッドっ

REGULAR.description:
During their visit to the hot springs, Keiichi and the goddesses encounter Marller, who ends up socially drinking with Urd. But Marller manages to snatch a strand of Urd`s hair, and uses it to make a clone to extract the demon side of Urd.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalainen ja demoninen minä?
Aa! Megami to Akuma no Watashi!?
Ah ! Suis-je un ange ou un démon ?
Ah! I`m Half Goddess, Half Demon?!
ああっ女神と悪魔の私っ?

REGULAR.description:
After confusing Keiichi and the goddesses, Devil Urd is confronted by the real Urd, and they battle it out. But just when Devil Urd has the upper hand, her weakness reaches her and she escapes. Urd plans to get rid of her by exploiting her weakness, but Belldandy realizes that in order to do that Urd would have to sacrifice herself. Skuld and the others try to come up with a way to save Urd.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Yami o Osorezu Kagayaite!
Aa! Älä pelkää pimeyttä, hohda kirkkaana!
Ah ! La lumière vaincra les ténèbres !
Ah! Shimmer Without Fear of the Darkness!
ああっ闇を恐れず輝いてっ

REGULAR.description:
Urd deals with her split personality, and ponders the eventuality of becoming a pure goddess. In order to become normal again, Urd resorts to calling the demon queen Hild, who also happens to be Urd`s mother!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Daimakaichou-sama Kourin!
Aa! Demonikuningatar ilmestyy!
Ah! The Chair of Demonkind Descends!
Ah, la venue de la reine de l`enfer !
ああっ大魔界長さまっ降臨っ

REGULAR.description:
Marller and Hild have an old lamp that they can use to trap people by projecting something they desire most and getting them to kiss the lamp.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Mazoku no Ishin wa Arimasuka!?
Aa! Onko demoneilla arvokkuutta?
Ah! Do Demons Have Any Dignity?!
Ah, le prestige des démons !
ああっ魔属の威信はありますかっ?

REGULAR.description:
A band of ninjas raid the temple to try to separate Keiichi and Belldandy so that Belldandy has to return to heaven.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalattaren rakkaus voi pelastaa ninjat!
Aa! Megami no Ai wa Shinobi o Sukuu!
Ah! The Love of a Goddess Saves!
Ah, l`amour de la déesse sauve les ninjas !
ああっ女神の愛はシノビを救うっ

REGULAR.description:
Belldandy must spend a week without using her magical powers. Keiichi and the gang then get dumped on literally as all their friends and decide to store their things at the temple. Skuld creates a device that enlarges the storage room but when Keiichi and Belldandy use it, something goes wrong and they end up lost in a seemingly infinite space!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Donna Basho demo Futari Nara!
Aa! Paikalla ei ole väliä kunhan olemme yhdessä!
Ah! It Doesn`t Matter Where, So Long As We`re Together!
Ah, peu importe où on est tant qu`on est ensemble !
ああっどんな場所でも二人ならっ

REGULAR.description:
Belldandy returns home with her reissued license. With it, she tries a spell but something goes wrong; her license is for demonic powers! As her sisters go to heaven to get it fixed, Belldandy spends time with Keiichi, but with the Ultimate Force working for evil, just about everything goes wrong. Whenever Belldandy tries to fix things, it has an ill effect on Keiichi. According to Marller, Belldandy will have to resort to being a demon to save him!
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Onko se OK vaikka olenkin demoni?
Aa! Watashi ga Mazoku demo Ii Desuka!?
Ah ! M`aimerais-tu si j`étais un démon ?
Ah! Would It Be Okay If I Were a Demon?!
ああっ私が魔属でもいいですかっ?

REGULAR.description:
The demon queen Hild decides to take matters into her own hands as she traps Keiichi in a romantic situation with herself, and Keiichi is totally going along with the relationship. The goddesses investigate how Hild is able to control Keiichi without hypnosis or drugs, and take action when Hild does some uncovering of her own. Belldandy must make a tough choice of controlling her jealousy and love.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Jumalattaren rakkaudentunnustus!
Aa! Megami no Kokuhaku!
Ah! The Goddess`s Confession!
Ah, la déesse déclare sa flamme !
ああっ女神の告白っ

SPECIAL.description:
Keiichi, the goddesses, and the motor club gang visit a family friend`s house, and meet a woman named Chieko Honda, but she is a contemporary of Keiichi`s grandfather, and had passed away. Could she be a ghost? The goddesses apparently think so, and Keiichi must figure out the reason she`s still around and the loose ends she`s trying to have resolved.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Lupaus jonka aika ylittää
Aa! Sorezore no Unmei!
Ah! Everyone Has a Destiny!
Ah, chacun son destin !
ああっそれぞれの運命っ

SPECIAL.description:
Peorth decides that it`s time to fulfill her other mission with Keiichi, and that is to get him to give a proper confession of love to Belldandy. Keiichi gets really nervous about it, and can`t do it. Chihiro picks up on that and creates a situation for a confession but it doesn`t work. Peorth decides to give Keiichi some "Special Training" on confessions, while Urd devises another one of her pills to enable Keiichi to say the words loudly and clearly.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Aa! Rakastajan laulu joka ravistaa sydäntä!?
Aa! Suki wa Kokoro o Yusaburu Uta!
Ah! The Song of Love That Shakes the Heart!
Ah, l`amour est une chanson qui fait chavirer les coeurs !
ああっ好きは心を揺さぶる歌っ
Opening
Ending 1a
Ending 1b
Ending 2
Promo
Promo

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

Ah! My Goddess: Everyone Has Wings

Ah! Zeiţa Mea: Oricine are Aripi
Ah!! My Goddess: Sorezore no Hane
Ах! Богиньо моя! Всеки има крила
Ах! Моя богиня: у каждого есть крылья
Моя богиня! (сезон второй)
